description: Veruca James is desperate to quit smoking and seeks the help of a very unique agency to assist her in this process. Once the contract is signed all she has to do is simply not smoke. Bad habits die hard and Veruca can't control her cravings and finds herself in a world of lesbian punishment, bondage and strap-on ass fucking. These evil lesbians are going to make sure that Veruca will never look at another cigarette again.
title: Nasty Habits
